block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Learn how to Fold this Un-unfoldable box designed by Ed Sullivan. Once it is complete, you cannot easily open the model and check the crease pattern. Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

block_list.title: More Designs from Ed Sullivan

  • Un-unfoldable Box by Ed Sullivan
